What is IndieWebClub?

IndieWebClub is part of a growing world-wide network of meetups for everyone who wants to take back their web experience from social media silos, and own their online identities & content, or just want support with blogging!

  • Want to blog more and looking for: ideas, momentum, and a supportive community?
  • Join a gathering of like-minded people and get friendly support with writing, creating, and anything related to using and improving your own website!
  • You do not need to have any tech background or experience in having your own website. You can even start with a Google Doc or your local notes app!

About IndieWebClub Bangalore

  • We have a WhatsApp community where we post announcements and share work done by our members. Please join by clicking here.
  • See https://blr.indiewebclub.org for a regularly updated feed of blog posts by our members.

Agenda

This will be a writing focused session. This week we’re talking about digital gardens! Our agenda for the discussions is:

  • A rapid fire history of digital gardens, evergreen notes, zettelkasten, and personal knowledge management systems
  • How to read a digital garden, and how to write one
  • Tradeoffs and constraints (what the format is good for, what it’s bad for)
  • The ethos of writing that evolves

As usual, we will end the meetup with a prompt and a writing session. Bring a device you can use to write and post to your blog.
